Source.Name: perl-gtk3
Source.Summary: Perl interface to the 3.x series of the gtk+ toolkit
Source.Description: Perl bindings to the 3.x series of the gtk+ toolkit. This module allows you to write graphical user interfaces in a Perlish and object-oriented way, freeing you from the casting and memory management in C, yet remaining very close in spirit to original API.
